Bitfusion is building software to accelerate applications, data-centers. Our team is building software for heterogeneous architectures, and works with some of the cutting edge hardware spanning CPUs, GPUs, FPGAs and software technologies, some of them not even released in the market yet. Our offices are in Austin downtown.

We are a Techstars company, TechCrunch Disrupt Battlefield '15 Finalist and Winner of Austin's A-list hottest emerging startup 2015. More about us at http://www.bitfusion.io/company/news/

We are looking for sharp folks to join our team. We are hiring cloud engineer, compiler engineer and opencl/cuda engineer in Austin, Texas to work on some of the most interesting computer science and engineering problems. Competitive Salary + Equity + Full Health Benefits + Free drinks/snacks/happy-hours. We are a small team (less than 10) today. This is a ground floor startup opportunity to work with emerging technologies in a way that is 2-3 years ahead of its time. Internships also available.
